Passonneau To work is to live without dying. Rainer Maria Rilke Rebecca Passonneau (Ph.D. in Linguistics, University of Chicago, 1985) works concurrently as a Research Scientist in the Department of Computer Science at Columbia University and as a Visiting Research Scientist in Bellcore's Applied Research Group . Previously she worked in the Natural Language Group, Paoli Research Center, Unisys. This page is still under construction  . . .
